name: We're Lost, Boy
description:
Explore a deserted island so you can keep your best friend alive, and hopefully find a way to freedom.

Move with the arrow keys to explore and collect food and equipment. Return the food and equipment to your camp for your best friend to eat and build with, respectively. 

Version 3 is the official LD submission, all later versions were posted after the deadline. We recommend playing the latest version as it will include bug fixes, but we will leave Version 3 up for LD purists.

Team Lead and Programmer - Sam Evans

Artistic Director - Connor Egan

Sound Design - Tatiana Aristizabal

Music Director - Joey Lyon

Level Design - David Parker
